body.description: Amplify your game Keep your in-game communications crisp with the comfortable new Xbox One Chat Headset. Hear friends and foes in crystal-clear digital audio. Keep your in-game communications crisp with the Xbox One Chat Headset. Hear friends and foes in crystal-clear digital audio. The Chat Headset is designed for comfort during long gaming sessions. Plus, you can adjust the mute and volume settings without taking your hands off the controller. Chat Headset Features A better multiplayer experience* Chat privately with your friends while gaming Chat in crystal-clear digital audio Lightweight and comfortable for long gaming sessions Responsive microphone with adjustable boom Easy to use Connects to the Xbox One Wireless Controller -- no batteries needed Mute and volume controls at your fingertips Wearable on left or right ear * Voice chat features require Xbox Live Gold membership (sold separately).3.5-mm Chat Headset controls:Volume controls: A volume up/down dial is on the side of the audio controls. Simply scroll it up or down to your preference.You can also adjust your headset audio and mic monitoring by going to Settings and selecting Devices & Accessories. Select your controller and then select the audio option you want to use.Mute: The mute button is a slider button on the front of the audio controls. Slide it down to mute, and you will see an orange color on the controls. Slide it up to unmute, and you will see a green color on the controls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets the job done!
reviews.reviewText: My kiddos are super hard on headsets. These are small and fit their heads well and they’re cheap! So even if they did get destroyed it won’t break the bank to replace them! The price was so good I bought 3 and now my kids don’t have to share. 🙌🏼

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great one ear Xbox headset
reviews.reviewText: I really like this headset. It has a mute button you can press that is very helpful and a volume up and down button. I like how it is only on one ear so that I can also hear other people in the house when they need to speak with me or if somebody were to knock on my door. I don't know about other games but when I play my elder scrolls online, I only hear the person or people chatting with me and not the music or noise of the game, but of course one ear is uncovered and you can hear that coming from the TV itself. These are definitely the type of headsets that you need to be gentle with but I have been able to make a pair last a couple years and I've also had a pair last only one year but I do love this particular model the best but it does seem that they may be not making them anymore since you cannot get them on the Xbox store anymore and I have only been able to find them for sale through third-party sellers and it will definitely make me sad when I can no longer buy one from anyone. I do recommend this headset

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars no frills, simple and great
reviews.reviewText: The Xbox One Chat Headset is a no-frills, plug-and-play solution that delivers exactly what it promises. I appreciate its simplicity – just plug it in, and you're good to go. The convenience of having the mute button and volume controls easily accessible on the controller is a definite plus, allowing for quick adjustments without interrupting gameplay.While there are certainly fancier and more expensive headsets on the market, the Xbox One Chat Headset is perfect for those who need something quick and easy. It gets the job done without any hassle or complications.In summary, if you're looking for a straightforward and reliable headset for your Xbox One, this is it. It may not have all the bells and whistles of higher-end models, but it's a solid choice for gamers who value simplicity and ease of use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars works great, no problems.
reviews.reviewText: Haven't had any problems with it, audio is good sending and receiving.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Trash, Package was warped, Headset was broken
reviews.reviewText: This straight up did not work. Plugged it in, no sound, no mic. Package was beat up. I'm positive this was used, broken, and resold.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars it keeps the house warm n very affordable
reviews.reviewText: my son loves his headset its the perfect gaming headphones with mic that he wanted. he wants another gaming headset

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The reason why I gave it 3 stars was because how bad it worked. I have not had it long and I bought two at the same time. It seems to disconnect from Xbox intermittently and becomes unable to be detected. I hope others have had better luck than I did. I didn’t go below 3 stars because at first it worked amazing. So with that being said I won’t buy another and can’t recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Chat Headset replacement for Original XBox One
reviews.reviewText: If you own the Original XBox One with controllers that don't have a 3.5mm audio jack built into them then this is your only option for replacing the headset that came with your XBox. The replacement headset works fine. I can hear the chat conversation well and others hear me with no distortion or static. The headset does not have the same frequency response or dynamic range of more expensive headsets but this one meets my needs and should meet the needs of most casual gamers who own the Original XBox One.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works great nearly free it’s so cheap
reviews.reviewText: This is the best deal around don’t sleep

Totalmente satisfecho en cuanto a la calidad de audio. Es importante resaltar que solo sirve para el chat, el audio de los juegos continúa separado en la TV. En lo personal no tengo quejas. El único detalle: el cable es bastante delgado y obliga a ser cuidadoso en no darle tirones.

Tendo em mente a que o produto se destina, é uma excelente aquisição. Ele é muito mais resistente que outros modelos mais baratos. Tomando os devidos cuidados na utilização, principalmente quanto ao fio sendo enrolado no próprio eixo, pode durar de 3 vezes mais que os modelos mais baratos. Sempre compro desse modelo oficial, pois não gosto dos headsets que cobrem o(s) ouvido(s) por completo. Recomendo muito esse produto para as pessoas com a mesma opinião.

Hervorragendes Produkt! Beim Online-Spielen kann man sich bestens mit seinem Team, oder anderen austauschen. Einfach anzudockenen an den Xbox Kontroller. Das einzige, was mich stört, ist, daß das Headset von der Batterie des Kontroller gespeißt wird. Ansonsten: Top Produkt zum Hammerpreis! Jederzeit wieder!

reviews.reviewTitle: It’s a great headset especially for old gen controller
reviews.reviewText: It’s a great headset for those who got an old generation console and a controller too! Especially I was struggling with plugging headset into my old gen controller so that I could talk to some people in online games like Fortnite but that was the old days now and yeah especially if you’re looking forward to buy this! Sure do it’s a great headset and a good for gaming. The best part is that it has a mute mic button so that you can mute the mic whenever u want to just by pressing the buttons. 😼👌🏻
